Items.Title: Oversight - The Use of Automated Decision Systems and Artificial Intelligence by New York City Agencies.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The Use of Automated Decision Systems and Artificial Intelligence by New York City Agencies.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing an office of algorithmic data integrity
Items.MatterName: Establishing an office of algorithmic data integrity.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the creation of appropriate and responsible use practices for artificial intelligence tools used by city agencies
Items.MatterName: Creation of appropriate and responsible use practices for artificial intelligence tools used by city agencies.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a centralized list of artificial intelligence tools approved to be used by agencies
Items.MatterName: Requiring a centralized list of artificial intelligence tools approved to be used by agencies

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring reporting on the impact of algorithmic tools on city employees and changes in employment responsibilities due to algorithmic tools
Items.MatterName: Requiring reporting on the impact of algorithmic tools on city employees and changes in employment responsibilities due to algorithmic tools.
